title: Delve deeply into patients with common diagnosis

content.question: Clinical researchers are interested in gaining insight into the causes of abnormal behavior. One way that they do this is to delve deeply into the histories of patients with a common diagnosis, interviewing family, friends, teachers, therapists, physicians, babysitters, and others who can provide rich details about the patientsâ€™ lives. Then, researchers try to see if there are any common themes in the information gathered. What research method does this strategy represent?

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
